      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  AbstractConfigurationCapabilityValidator
      Abstract validator, that instanciates the ConfigurationCapabilityFactory.
      class  AbstractConfigurationFactoryValidator
      Abstract validator, that instanciates the ConfigurationFactory.
      class  AbstractContainerFactoryValidator
      Abstract validator, that instanciates the ContainerFactory.
      class  AbstractDeployerFactoryValidator
      Abstract validator, that instanciates the DeployerFactory.
      class  AbstractPackagerValidator
      Abstract validator, that instanciates the PackagerFactory.
      class  HasAuthenticationSupportValidator
      Validate that a container supports authentication configuration.
      class  HasBundleSupportValidator
      Validate that a container supports OSGi bundles.
      class  HasDataSourceSupportValidator
      Validate that a container supports DataSource configuration.
      class  HasDeployableSupportValidator
      Validator, that instanciates the ContainerCapabilityFactory for DeployableType.
      class  HasDirectoryPackagerValidator
      Validate that the specified container has a directory packager registered.
      class  HasEarSupportValidator
      Validate that a container supports EAR archives.
      class  HasExistingConfigurationValidator
      Validate that a container has an existing configuration.
      class  HasInstalledLocalContainerValidator
      Validate that a container id has an installed local container implementation.
      class  HasLocalDeployerValidator
      Validate that the specified container has a local deployer.
      class  HasPortOffsetValidator
      Validator, that check if the container supports port offset.
      class  HasRemoteContainerValidator
      Validate that a container has a remote container.
      class  HasRemoteDeployerValidator
      Validate that the specified container has a remote deployer.
      class  HasResourceSupportValidator
      Validate that a container supports Resource configuration.
      class  HasRuntimeConfigurationValidator
      Validate that a container has a runtime configuration.
      class  HasSpawnSupportValidator
      Validator, that check if the container supports port offset.
      class  HasStandaloneConfigurationValidator
      Validate that a container has a standalone configuration.
      class  HasWarSupportValidator
      Validate that a container supports WAR archives.
      class  HasXAEmulationValidator
      Validate that a container supports DataSource configuration.
      class  HasXASupportValidator
      Validate that a container supports DataSource configuration.
      class  IsEmbeddedLocalContainerValidator
      Validate that a container is an embedded local container.
      class  IsInstalledLocalContainerValidator
      Validate that a container is an installed local container.
      class  IsLocalContainerValidator
      Validate that a container is a local container.
      class  StartsWithContainerValidator
      Validate that a container id starts with a specific value.
      class  SupportsPropertyValidator
      Validator, that check if the container supports a given property.
